Database.description: The database name of the Milvus server to connect to.

DisableHealthChecks.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the Milvus client health check is disabled or not.

Endpoint.description: The endpoint URI string of the Milvus server to connect to.

Key.description: The auth Key of the Milvus server to connect to.

Client.description: Provides the client configuration settings for connecting to a Milvus server using MilvusClient.
